duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce daily news content, feature news reporting, and special event coverage
Supervise, assign, and direct professional staff of reporters and producers, as well as extensive student volunteer staff
Help recruit, schedule, train, supervise and assign student volunteers
Set editorial standards and direction, consistent with station goals and market conditions
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in relevant field required (broadcast & digital journalism, journalism, media, etc.); Master’s Degree preferred.
